message.content: This question requires understanding the relationship between flower size and nectar production. Since big flowers have more nectar than small flowers, it follows that bees will be attracted to the bigger flowers in order to get more nectar. Option (A) is incorrect because "space cadet" is unrelated to flower size or nectar production. Option (B) is incorrect because smaller flowers have less nectar, so bees will not be as attracted to them. Option (D) is incorrect because dead flowers do not produce nectar and therefore will not attract bees.
